name: Dossier, the ninja mouse
description:
A ninja mouse fighting his way through rat hoards and cats to gather cheese. Will he be able to defeat the big rat boss and collect the ultimate prized cheese?

The first game I created! I hope you guys enjoy playing it ;)

All in game navigation are done by using keyboard only.

In-game Navigation:

Escape=> Pause/Unpause game & bring up menu
Up & Down Arrows=> Navigate menu items
Enter=> Select/toggle menu item

Character Movement:

Left Arrow=> Move Left

Right Arrow=> Move right
Up Arrow or Spacebar=> Jump
'A'=> Attack (after weapon upgrade)
'S'=> Special (after weapon upgrade)

All sounds and music tracks are from other sources. Credits, attributions and links below:
